body.name: TKGOU USB Microphone for PC, Computer Microphone, PC Microphone with Mute Button & LED Indicator, Laptop Desktop Condenser Mic, Great for Podcast, Gaming, Streaming, Recording - Windows & Mac
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 41 mins
features: 【HIGH DEFINITION AUDIO 】 This microphone embeds a patented audio filter in order to record only your voice. Good for home studio, Chatting, Skype,Discord, Yahoo Recording, YouTube Recording, Google Voice Search and Steam.

【PLUG & PLAY 】 You just need to plug the microphone and it will work ! No software to install. A single button to turn it on or off. Compatible with every operating system - Mac OS X Windows Linux - and every PC brand (Apple Asus HP etc)

【SMOOTH AND CLEAR】 Noise cancellation and isolates the main sound source, This USB Microphone is perfect for videoconferencing, Skype, dictation or voice recognition. The audio filter will give you a clear and confident voice. Anti-pop filter included !

【MUTE BUTTON & LED INDICATOR 】One click to mute/unmute your microphone,Build-in LED indicator tells you the working status at any time.Built with a mix of metal and heavy duty plastic, it's solid as a tank. It is very stable thanks to its weight.360 Degree Position Adjustable Gooseneck Design --Adopting the design of metal gooseneck pipe pickup the sound from 360-degree with high sensitivity

【SATISFACTORY SERIVCE】- 30 days unconditional return. TKGOU Customer service 2 years, We are committed to ensuring that you are 100% satisfied, If you have any questions, please contact us directly.We will provide you with a more friendly and satisfactory service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for virtual meetings
reviews.reviewText: this is light and easy to install. this mic is a good alternative to the mic in airpods. the audio quality is good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and functional
reviews.reviewText: I picked this up because the built-in microphone on my computer decided to stop working. This has a nice, small form factor, and the neck is pretty flexible, so you can put it behind your display with just the tip showing. There was no need for any drivers or other software - just plug it in, select it as your input device and it works fine. I am not a gamer, so I cannot say how well it meets those needs, but it works perfectly for regular video conference purposes. If you find yourself in a similar situation and need a good-quality mic, try this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent microphone for chatting, not very good at noice cancelling.
reviews.reviewText: The description of this microphone makes some incredible claims.Claim #1: This microphone embeds a patented audio filter in order to record only your voice. Good for home studio, Chatting, Skype,Discord, Yahoo Recording, YouTube Recording, Google Voice Search and Steam.My experience #1: Only my voice? not really. Good for home studio? I guess, depending on what you are recording. Chatting? Definately good enough for that. Claim #1 is dubious.Claim #2: You just need to plug the microphone and it will work ! No software to install. A single button to turn it on or off. Compatible with every operating system - Mac OS X Windows Linux - and every PC brand (Apple Asus HP etc)Expereince #2: I connected it to my windows 10 laptop and it worked with no extra effort.Claim #3:Noise cancellation and isolates the main sound source, This USB Microphone is perfect for videoconferencing, Skype, dictation or voice recognition. The audio filter will give you a clear and confident voice. Anti-pop filter included !Experience #3: See experience #1, this is just repeating itself. It does have a windsock/pop filter. It's alright.Claim #4: One click to mute/unmute your microphone,Build-in LED indicator tells you the working status at any time.Built with a mix of metal and heavy duty plastic, it's solid as a tank. It is very stable thanks to its weight.360 Degree Position Adjustable Gooseneck Design --Adopting the design of metal gooseneck pipe pickup the sound from 360-degree with high sensitivityExperience #4: Mute buton works as expected, the LED is kinda bright for my taste but whatever. I would have never called the plastic parts heavy duty, but it doesn't feel cheap. It almost sounded like the base was weighted, but it isn't. The gooseneck works well and keeps position so this is good.Claim #5: TKGOU Customer service 2 years, 30 days unconditional return. We are committed to ensuring that you are 100% satisfied, If you have any questions, please contact us directly.We will provide you with a more friendly and satisfactory service.Experence #5: Worked well enough out of the box, I didn't need their customer support.Overall, not a bad microphone for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best quality plug-and-play mic for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Ever since the stay-at-home days started, I've been using my Logitech G533 gaming headset for all my computer audio needs. It has a great mic (and sounds fantastic, BTW), but after months of near daily use I got tired of wearing a big headset for every call. I purchased this mic due to the reasonable price and the many rave reviews, and I am not disappointed!As a technical communicator, I need something with quality sound for recording as well as calls. I tested recording on this mic in OBS Studio and I'm quite pleased with how good my voice sounded. People on calls have told me that I come through loud and clear as well. It picks me up clearly from up to 2 feet away, and since it's omnidirectional it will pick up both me and another source of sound in the room, which is important for Zoom karaoke! As long as it's not right next to my laptop's speakers, it will not pick up stray audio. My jet-engine-loud air conditioner does sometimes come through if I'm set up in the living room, right next to the intake vent.The hardware itself feels sturdy, including the highly-flexible metal neck, and the base (with a 4x5" footprint) has a good weight to it. The mechanical ON/OFF switch, which has a solid in-and-out click, gives me peace of mind when I want to be sure I'm muted on a call. The ON light is fairly bright, so I covered it in a LightDims original strength sticker and it no longer bugs me (see picture). The cord length is just about perfect, since I'm on a laptop and didn't want to deal with a massive loop of cable cluttering up my desk, but it seems long enough to reach the back of any desktop case without any issues.Overall, this is an easy-to-use and high-quality microphone that has everything I need and nothing I don't. It's one of the most satisfying purchases I've made all year, and I highly recommend it if you need a good inexpensive mic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars not too bad
reviews.reviewText: this mic was extremely easy to set up with my windows system, and worked almost instantly! the only issue i can see anyone having is that it picks up a little background noise but nothing that cant be removed in basic sound editing programs. a decent mic for a decent price - and perfect for everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Using this item for teams calls since my new laptop mic sounded awful to others. Plug n play easy set up. Doesn’t take up much desktop space and functions great. I did have someone tell me the clarity was much better than my computer mic however, every so often it sounded like I was losing connection as they would hear every other word. I tend to speak fast so when I slowed down, all was better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If like me, you only use It now and again for some kind of long winded question and cannot be bothered to type, but use your voice Instead, It really Is a VERY good mice, with a nice wide base.I can do a voice search with It being 3ft away from me and there is zero need to raise your voice as this mic picks it up perfectly, every single time!
Después de aproximadamente 4 meses el botón mute no funciona, y se te escucha lo pulses o no.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: microfoon geeft sterke ruis af tijdens bellen
reviews.reviewText: Het lijkt een deugdelijk, stevig en duurzaam apparaat. Het geeft echter een zeer irritante ruis tijdens het videobellen, ook nadat ik de instellingen volgens de handleiding heb aangepast. Dit maakt het product helaas onbruikbaar voor mij.
funziona subito, senza installazione e comodo pulsante esclusione
